pageProduct.name: QV Face Lip Balm 15G With Spf 30+
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Moisturising lip balm and SPF 30+ protection helps to keep your lips soft and smooth, even when you’re out in the wind and sun.

Warnings

CAUTION:
Avoid eyes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. Store below 30°C.

Always read the label and use only as directed.
If symptoms persist see a healthcare professional.

Common Uses

• Softens and helps protect dry or sensitive lips
• Uniquely shaped glide-on applicator is soft on lips.
• Broad spectrum SPF 30+ protection.
• Free from fragrance, colour, lanolin, PABA and propylene glycol.
• Free from fragrance, colour, lanolin, and propylene glycol.

Directions

Gently smooth evenly over clean, dry lips prior to exposure to sun, wind, cold and other harsh climatic conditions or whenever lips are dry. Reapply every 2 hours for maximum benefit.
